exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) FPset := fun _ : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => list (poly A0 eqA ltM) : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) -> Set Co := lexprod (list (poly A0 eqA ltM)) FPset (RO A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os) Fl : {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> {x : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) & FPset x} -> Prop P : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : forall a b : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a P -> In b P -> reds a b P Unable to unify "reds ?M2337 ?M2338 P" with "SpolyQ A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P".
